description: A vice foreign minister of China, Liu Zhenmin, said on Friday that his government rejected the decision by an international tribunal to hear a territorial dispute in the South China Sea.
title: China Rejects Dispute Arbitration
title_page: China Rejects Dispute Arbitration - Video - NYTimes.com
text: A vice foreign minister of China, Liu Zhenmin, said on Friday that his government rejected the decision by an international tribunal to hear a territorial dispute in the South China Sea.
